title: lack of accountability for devices
extract: noun. The definition of accountability is taking or being assigned responsibility for something that you have done or something you are supposed to do. An example of accountability is when an employee admits an error she made on a project.
extract_html: noun. The definition of accountability is taking or being assigned responsibility for something that you have done or something you are supposed to do. An example of accountability is when an employee admits an error she made on a project.
